sentences: Mary Jane Cruz Mendoza (born August 29, 1965), known professionally as Jamie Rivera, is a pop singer from the Philippines and also known as the Inspirational Diva.
Most recently, she is known for singing the theme song of the Papal Visit 2015
Most recently, she is known for singing the theme song of the Papal Visit 2015
She also met Pope Francis during his Apostolic visit to the Philippines on January 15–19, 2015.
She is married to JB Mendoza and has a daughter named Reine Mendoza, who was born on December 12, 1996.

In August 2003, Jamie was accused for incorrect lyrics involving one of its songs, "My Life In Your Hands" from her 2001 album, Seasons.
In August 2003, Jamie was accused for incorrect lyrics involving one of its songs, "My Life In Your Hands" from her 2001 album, Seasons.
The song was composed by Kathy Troccoli and Bill Montvilo, and originally performed by Troccoli in 1994 and later by Kirk Franklin in 1997.
The song was composed by Kathy Troccoli and Bill Montvilo, and originally performed by Troccoli in 1994 and later by Kirk Franklin in 1997.

Narciso Chan, the sales and marketing director of BMG Pilipinas (now Sony Music Philippines) says that the incorrect lyrics, the misspelling of the song's composers and uncrediting of the publishers of the song "My Life In Your Hands" is 'blatantly illegal' under the United States copyright laws.

Star Records' VP for operations Annabelle Regaldo, managing director Enrico Santos and marketing director Heinrich Ngo said that her album Seasons will reissued with correct lyrics of the song "My Life In Your Hands" in October 2003, with the correction of the song composers' names and inclusion of the publisher's credits in the album's liner notes, as well as three additional tracks for the 2003 re-release of the album.
